verses.text: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3212"\w*, ‘We \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.’

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H8179"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w*, \w within|strong="H3389"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.
